sentences.en: She had undergone an amazing metamorphosis from awkward schoolgirl to beautiful woman.
sentences.cn: 她经历了从笨女生到大美人这一令人惊讶的变化。

sentences.en: That schoolgirl was sitting with her feet stretched far out into the aisle, and was busily chewing gum, when the teacher espied her.
sentences.cn: 当老师看见那个女生时，她坐在座位上，脚伸到过道里，嘴里拼命地嚼着口香糖。

sentences.en: In 2002, News of the World had apparently hacked into the voice-mail of a missing schoolgirl, Milly Dowler, who was later found murdered.
sentences.cn: 2002年，《世界新闻报》窃听了失踪女学生米莉·道勒的语音信箱，之后发现她已被杀害。
